ygData.subject: Re: Bard Instuments Wishlist
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Depends, if you are hunting Blackburrow then that would be a drag...if you venture out farther, then it would make sense. There is no one solution that
ygData.messageBody:
> Bind IN the bank! I do when I can - that way spare drum, food and wep are
> all ready to go!

Depends, if you are hunting Blackburrow then that would be a drag...if you
venture out farther, then it would make sense. There is no one solution that
covers all situations. Currently I am bound in the bank in Highpass Keep,
which is great...unless I arrive during the middle of a pitched battle...And
of course, there is no bank in the Arena...
It was just an idea, the "then everyone will want something that works that
way" argument isn't very convincing...so it remains, just an idea, one I
like. :o)

Tszaaz
